alert.note: Alert for Garrard; Madison (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 06 at 3:46PM EST until March 06 at 4:15PM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Louisville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Garrard County in central Kentucky... Southern Madison County in central Kentucky... * Until 415 PM EST. * At 346 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southeast of Lancaster, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Garrard and southern Madison Counties, including the following locations... Duluth, Paint Lick, Bighill, Manse, Panola, Kingston, Whites, Buggytown, Cartersville and Hyattsville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
